sentences.en: ...the famous MGM logo of the roaring lion.
sentences.cn: …米高梅公司著名的怒吼狂狮标志。

sentences.en: And the head of LOGO , writing: Thank you to come to help, bless you restful.
sentences.cn: 而LOGO的题头, 则写着: 感谢您救援, 祝福您平安.

sentences.en: Any team using an inappropriate name or logo also excluded.
sentences.cn: 任何参赛队的不适当名字和logo也被禁止.

sentences.en: Ask big LOGO of number Kuang Wei colour Gao Bang canvas shoes LOGO to be blue?
sentences.cn: 求货号匡威粉色高帮帆布鞋又大LOGO的 LOGO是蓝色的?

sentences.en: baseball caps emblazoned with the team's logo
sentences.cn: 饰有球队标识的棒球帽

sentences.en: Logo included that contains more than 2,000 objects and clip art gallery.
sentences.cn: 附带包含2000多个Logo对象和剪贴画的图库.

sentences.en: Make your logo easy to remember and prominent.
sentences.cn: 使你的logo看上去清晰可辨、效果凸显.

sentences.en: No logo or special designs are to be attached to the fascia.
sentences.cn: 招牌上不允许有商标或者特殊的设计。

sentences.en: Number of fingerprint identification data, which have PBA, LOGO, the contents of a single landing.
sentences.cn: 一些指纹识别的资料, 里面有PBA, LOGO, 单一登陆等内容.

sentences.en: Stationery can be imprinted with your message or logo.
sentences.cn: 可以把你的信息或标志印在信纸上。

sentences.en: The Longman logo, a small sailing ship, is on the cover of this book.
sentences.cn: 本书的封面上印有朗文公司的小帆船标志.

sentences.en: The usual logical control pattem ( LOGO ! ) and its application in elevator control were introduced.
sentences.cn: 介绍了通用逻辑控制模块 LOGO! 的概况和在提升机控制中的应用.

sentences.en: Then, put the logo in magazines and on billboards without telling anyone what it means.
sentences.cn: 接着我们把这个商标刊在杂志和广告看板上,却不跟任何人透漏它的涵意.

sentences.en: We also offer the OEM services, LOGO imprint and advertising slogan imprint according to customer requests.
sentences.cn: 产品主要涉及无纺布袋、广告袋、礼品袋 、 包装袋、购物袋、西服套等,可根据客户要求提供OEM服务,加印企业LOGO及 广告宣传标语等.

sentences.en: We did the logo in lower-case letters instead of capitals.
sentences.cn: 我们的徽标用了小写字母，没用大写。

sentences.en: You can use the logo in all your promotional material.
sentences.cn: 你们可以将这个标志用在所有的宣传材料中。

trans.tran_cn: （某公司或机构的）标识，标志，徽标，logotype 的缩略形式，[计算机] LOGO 教学语言，儿童教学语言
trans.tran_en: a small design that is the official sign of a company or organization
